title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.

title: Theme Style
content: Set the topic type of the link through the type attribute.

title: Disable links
content: You can use the disabled attribute to specify whether to disable links.

title: Do not display underscores when focusing.
content: When you hover the cursor over a link, the underline is displayed by default. If underline is set to false, the underline is not displayed when you focus.

title: Custom Icon
content: Icon can be customized by attribute icon, default slot, and icon slot.

title: Link
content: Use the href attribute to specify the URL to be redirected to. This attribute can be used together with the native attribute target.
